sentences.sentence: Happiness is a choice. So choose. Get out of your head. The heart is the one that knows, so follow it.
sentences.translation: 快乐需要自己选择，去选吧！别用大脑想，心才知道答案，听它的没错。

sentences.sentence: It is labor indeed that puts the difference on everything.
Work gives you meaning and purpose and life is empty without it.
sentences.translation: 工作赋予我们意义和目的，没有工作，生活将是空洞的。

sentences.sentence: No great achievement is possible without persistent work.
sentences.translation: 没有不懈的努力，就不会取得伟大的成就。

sentences.sentence: To realise the value of one minute, ask the traveler who has just missed his train.
sentences.translation: 要体会到一分钟的价值，就去问一个刚误了火车的旅行者。
